verses.roman:
bhīṣma-kanyā varārohā
kāṅkṣanty āgamanaṁ hareḥ
pratyāpattim apaśyantī
dvijasyācintayat tadā

synonyms: bhīṣma-kanyā—the daughter of Bhīṣmaka; vara-ārohā—having lovely hips; kāṅkṣantī—waiting for; āgamanam—the arrival; hareḥ—of Kṛṣṇa; pratyāpattim—the return; apaśyantī—not seeing; dvijasya—of the brāhmaṇa; acintayat—thought; tadā—then.
translation: The lovely daughter of Bhīṣmaka anxiously awaited the arrival of Kṛṣṇa, but when she did not see the brāhmaṇa return she thought as follows.
